notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: P.V. synthesised and sintered the sample, K.T. performed EBSD analysis and contributed to Raman scattering experiments, P.B. and I.G. performed and analysed the most of the Raman scattering experiments, P.O. verified the mathematical expressions and helped with improving the manuscript, J.H. conceived the principal idea and wrote the main text of the manuscript. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
